attributes.action: remove VAT charges on bicycles and adult-sized tricycles (qualifying non-motorized and electric power-assisted) and services performed on these cycles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Columbia, Canada does not apply sales tax on the purchase of cycles and any services performed on them.  They do this to encourage more cycle use in order to reduce climate change and encourage an active and healthy lifestyle.  Why can't we do the same?
